info.title: Cloud4Log API
info.description: The documented API is used by the frontend hosted on cloud4log.de. If you have valid login credentials you can start right away by using the button "Authorize". You can then start to call the API. The login request will respond with a organisation side-ID. You need this and ID for most of the requests, for example upload a delivery note into the sites delivery note pool: POST /organization-sites/{organizationSiteKey}/delivery-notes/pdf/{fileName}. Endpoints can appear multiple times, when they have more than one tag. See this Github repository to import the API directly into swagger and to see releases and changelogs: https://github.com/majuss/cloud4log-swagger

post.description:
Site A shares the access to all it's bundles (not the delivery note pool),
with another site B. Site B will be able to choose site A in the supply chain as consigneur.
Create API key on organization level.

201.description: Returns 201 when the API key was created.

post.description: Create new signature pad for checkout.

Get a signature from a signature pad for checkout.

post.description:
Creates an API user for the specified organization sites with
the specified permissions.
Returns a sessionId that can't received a second time.

get.description: Get a list of all API keys for the given organization

put.summary: Set new permissions for API key
put.description:
New permissions are set based on the given roles and organization sites.
You can also edit the API key user properties.

post.description: Create a new organization site, which belongs to {organizationKey}

get.summary: Get all organization sites of the organization.
get.description:
Get all organization sites of the organization.
Also returns archived sites and the date when the site was archived.

patch.description:
Modify an existing organization site.
Currently all properties are required.
In a later update all properties become optional.

delete.description:
Archives an organization site. After this request, the site is marked as archived.
Only read operations are possible after archive.
TODO: A delete job will delete the site, if the site is no longer needs in supply chains and other.

get.summary: Get organization users information
get.description:
Return all users of an organization. The organization must
belong to the calling user.
Permissions are returned.

200.description: All users of the requested organization

post.description:
Create a new user and add this user to the organization and the given organization sites
and equip the new user with permissions according to the given roles.
The requesting user must have access to the organization the new user is added.

204.description: The user was create and added to the organization

get.summary: Get information details for one organization user
get.description:
Return one user of an organization. The organization must
belong to the calling user.
Permissions are returned.

200.description: All users of the requested organization

put.summary: Edit user with new site roles/permission
put.description:
Edit a existing user and add this user to the given organization sites
and equip the new user with permissions according to the given roles.
The requesting user must have access to the organization the new user is added.
All previously set permissions and linked sites will be removed.
All sites and roles to be set must be passed.
The optional submitted password is ignored.

204.description: The user was edited and got new permissions

post.description:
Log in user and get initial user, organization and organization site
data with permissions.
Request login of user by email and send an email with 2fa code to login the user.

204.description: Email was sent successful to user with 2fa code to login

post.description: Log out the user.

post.summary: Start a new checkin with delivery notes.
post.description:
Start a new checkin with delivery notes.
All delivery notes must not be in a finished checkin.
If a delivery note is in another checkin with status 'started'
the delivery note is moved to the new checkin.
The driver information is copied to the new checkin.
The driver information from the most recent started checkin is used.
After the checkin was started it is possible
to add discrepancies, load carriers and associated files.
The checkin has the status 'started' -> 'signing' -> 'finished'.

patch.description:
Finish a checkin by sending the signatures of the consignee and
carrier. The signatures must be pngs in base64 format.

get.summary: Get a checkin document.
get.description: Get a checkin document with delivery notes.

put.description:
Update driver information of the relevant consignee delivery note bundle.
Returns 400 http status if any wrong input params are sent. Returns 200 when
the updated is successfully.
The checkin must be in status 'started'.

Get a complete pdf with checkout and checkin data: all delivery notes,
all attachments, all signatures and all images

Get all delivery note PDF's as merged PDF from consignee delivery

get.summary: get delivery note keys from wallet for checkin
get.description:
Get delivery notes for a checkin.
The token the token from the checkout wallet or from the tour wallet.

post.description:
Adds the posted delivery note PDF to the delivery note bundle.
The PDF is converted to PDF/A3.

Adds the posted delivery note PDF to the delivery note pool.
The PDF is converted to PDF/A3. The pool is a colleciton of loose delivery notes without a assigned supply chain or bundle.

post.summary: Add PDF to bundle with waybillNr
post.description:
Adds the posted delivery note PDF to the delivery note bundle.
The PDF is converted to PDF/A3.
The waybill numbers are collected from the PDF and will be returned.

post.summary: Add PDF to pool with waybillNr
post.description:
Adds the posted delivery note PDF to the delivery note pool.
The PDF is converted to PDF/A3.
The waybill numbers are collected from the PDF and will be returned.

get.description:
Get all delivery note PDF's as merged PDF from delivery note bundle.
If the delivery note bundle does not have any delivery note an HTTP

post.description:
Add existing delivery notes into an existing delivery note bundle.
The delivery note must not in any bundle when adding.
The delivery note bundle must be in status 'open'.

204.description:
All delivery note keys in the array were added to the
delivery note bundles.

delete.description:
Remove existing delivery notes from an existing delivery note bundle.
The delivery note must be in any bundle when removing.
The delivery note bundle must be in status 'open'.
The delevery notes would become detached from bundle and remain in pool.

204.description:
All delivery note keys in the array were removed from the
delivery note bundle.

get.summary: Get delivery note dat from bundle w/o lc
get.description:

200.description: body contains list of delivery notes metadata

get.summary: Get PDF from pool
get.description: Get delivery note PDF from delivery note pool.

200.description: body contains pdf in binary format

patch.description:
Patch a delivery note. If the delivery note belongs to a delivery
note bundle the data can only be updated if the bundle is in status
'open'. The number and order number must be set with the first patch
call for a delivery note.

delete.description:
Delete a delivery note with its PDF. The delivery note must not in
a delivery note bundle. Remaining load carriers or attachments are
also deleted.

delete.summary: Remove delivery note from open bundle and delete lc
delete.description:
Removes a delivery note from a bundle. Deletes also the load
carriers that hang on the delivery note. The bundles must be in
status 'open'.

204.description: the delivery note was removed from the bundle

get.summary: Get organizations sites of user

patch.description: Patch basic user information, like fullName.

put.description:
Request the change of the password of the current user.
After this the request must be completed with a 2fa code in another request,
which will be sent to the users email.

post.description:
Completes the password request with the correct 2fa code given in the body.
The current session is closed.

put.description:
Request the change of the email address of the current user.
After this an 2fa code is send to the old email address and another
2fa code is send to the new email address. Both 2fa codes are needed
to complete the email address change.

post.description:
Completes the email address change with both 2fa codes. One from the
old email address and one from the new email address.
The current session is closed.

put.description: Set or update the consignee users signature.

get.summary: Get consignee signature
get.description: Get the consignee users signature.

post.description: Accept latest version of terms of of service

204.description: Accepted latest version of terms of service

PostTourRequest.description: create new tour with supply chain keys

PostBundleRequest.description: create new bundle with supply chain keys

PatchBundleRequest.description: update name, consignor, carrier or consignee key

PatchDeliveryNoteRequest.description: Update metadata of a delivery note

SupplyChain.description: Full name of target organization site and the key

SupplyChainResponse.description: Permitted supply chains for user grouped by type of organization site

weight.description: Number of times this managed supply chain was used in the last 15 times.

carrierSignature.description: base64 encoded png of the signature

Organization.description: one organization the user belongs to

PatchConsigneeCheckinRequest.description: Finish a checkin by sending consignee and carrier signature.

driverSignature.description: base64 encoded png of the signature

consigneeSignature.description: base64 encoded png of the signature

DeliveryNoteDataForPdfMerge.description: all data and all attchments to create the merged PDF

BinaryFileType.description: data that is encoded as binary data

PermissionsType.description: for detailed permission descriptions consult the documentation

UserPermissionsType.description: All user permissions. If set to true user has this permission. This permissions are set directly to the user and operate globally.

service_provider_organizations_create.description: This permission is needed to create organizations

service_provider_organizations_read.description: This permission is needed to read organizations

service_provider_organizations_update.description: This permission is needed to update organizations

organization_read.description: This permission is needed for reading all own organizations

user_read.description: This permission is need for getting information of users

user_permissions_modify.description: This permission is needed for modifying permissions of a user

user_modify.description: This permission is needed for modifying basic global user information, like name, password or email (of own user)

user_signature_replace.description: This permission is needed to replace the user signature

user_signature_read.description: This permission is needed to read the user signature

user_me_read.description: This permission is needed to read the own user information

OrganizationPermissionsType.description: all organization permissions. If set to true user has this permission for the organization

administration_users_create.description: This permission is needed to create a user for the calling user's organization

administration_users_read.description: This permission is needed to get all users of the calling user's organization

administration_users_modify.description: This permission is needed to modify a user for the calling user's organization

administration_organization_sites_create.description: This permission is needed to create new sites for the organization

administration_organization_sites_read.description: This permission is needed to read all sites of an organization

loadcarrier_templates_read.description: This permission is needed for getting all permitted load carrier types

loadcarrier_templates_create.description: This permission is need for creating a new load carrier type

loadcarrier_templates_modify.description: This permission is needed for modifying a load carrier type

loadcarrier_templates_delete.description: This permission is needed for deleting a load carrier type

organization_read.description: This permission is needed for reading this organization

organization_modify.description: This permission is needed for modifying the specific organization

organization_delete.description: This permission is needed for deleting the specific organization

user_organization_permissions_modify.description: This permission is needed for modifying permissions of a user on organization level

user_assign.description: This permission is needed for assigning users to the organization

user_unassign.description: This permission is needed for unassigning users from the organization

users_create.description: This permission is needed to create a new user and add this user to the organization

user_read.description: This permission is needed for getting information of users from the organization

user_delete.description: This permission is need for deleting users from a organization

api_keys_create.description: The permission to create API keys

api_keys_read.description: The permission to read API keys

api_keys_modify.description: The permission to modify API keys

OrganizationSitePermissionsType.description: all organization site permissions. If set to true user has this permission for the organization site

administration_organization_sites_archiv.description: This permission is needed to archive the specified organization site

administration_organization_sites_modify.description: This permission is needed for modifying the site of an organization

supplychain_read.description: This permission is need for getting all permitted supply chain of the executing user

supplychain_create.description: This permission is need for creating a new supply chain connection between two organization sites

supplychain_delete.description: This permission is needed for deleting a connection of a supply chain between two organization sites

managed_supply_chains_create.description: This permission is needed for creating a new managed supply chain for the organization site

managed_supply_chains_read.description: This permission is needed for reading managed supply chain for the organization site

managed_supply_chains_delete.description: This permission is needed for deleting managed supply chains for the organization site

user_read.description: This permission is needed for getting information of users from the organization site

user_assign.description: This permission is needed for assigning users to an organization site

user_unassign.description: This permission is needed for unassigning users from the organization site

user_organization_site_permissions_modif.description: This permission is needed for modifying permissions of a user on organization site level

loadcarrier_read.description: This permission is needed for getting all permitted load carriers

loadcarrier_create.description: This permission is needed for creating a new load carrier

loadcarrier_delete.description: This permission is needed for deleting a load carrier

loadcarrier_modify.description: This permission is needed for modifying a load carrier

consignee_load_carriers_create.description: This permission is needed to create new consignee load carriers

consignee_load_carriers_replace.description: This permission is needed to replace all consignee load carriers with new ones

consignee_load_carriers_read.description: This permission is needed to get all consignee load carriers

consignee_discrepancies_create.description: This permission is needed to create new consignee discrepancies

consignee_discrepancies_read.description: This permission is needed to read consignee discrepancies

consignee_discrepancies_update.description: This permission is needed to update consignee discrepancies

consignee_discrepancies_replace.description: This permission is needed to replace all consignee discrepancies with new ones

consignee_discrepancies_delete.description: This permission is needed to delete consignee discrepancies

attachment_create.description: This permission is needed for creating a new attachment

attachment_read.description: This permission is needed for getting all permitted attachments

attachment_delete.description: This permission is needed for deleting a attachment

consignee_discrepancy_images_create.description: This permission is needed for creating a new discrepancy image

consignee_discrepancy_images_read.description: This permission is needed for reading a discrepancy image

consignee_discrepancy_images_delete.description: This permission is needed for deleting a discrepancy image

consignee_load_carrier_file_create.description: This permission is needed for creating a new load carrier file

consignee_load_carrier_file_read.description: This permission is needed for reading a load carrier file

consignee_load_carrier_file_delete.description: This permission is needed for deleting a load carrier file

consignee_receipts_create.description: This permission is needed for creating a new consignee receipts

consignee_receipts_read.description: This permission is needed for reading a consignee receipts

consignee_receipts_delete.description: This permission is needed for deleting a consignee receipts

discrepancies_create.description: This permission is needed for creating a new discrepancy

discrepancies_update.description: This permission is needed for getting all permitted discrepancies

discrepancies_read.description: This permission is needed for getting all permitted discrepancies

discrepancies_delete.description: This permission is needed for deleting a discrepancy

consignee_fine_discrepancies_create.description: This permission is needed for creating a new fine discrepancy

consignee_fine_discrepancies_read.description: This permission is needed for getting all permitted fine discrepancies

consignee_fine_discrepancies_delete.description: This permission is needed for deleting a fine discrepancy

delivery_note_bundles_create.description: user can create delivery note bundles

delivery_note_bundles_read.description: user can read delivery note bundles

delivery_note_bundles_update.description: user can update delivery note bundles

delivery_note_bundles_delete.description: user can delete delivery note bundles

delivery_note_bundles_merge.description: User can merge multiple delivery note bundles into a new one

delivery_note_bundles_checkout.description: User can checkout a delivery note bundle

delivery_note_bundles_checkout_multiple.description: User can checkout multiple delivery note bundles at once

delivery_note_bundles_checkin.description: User can checkin multiple delivery note bundles at once

send_wallet_invite_emails.description: User can send the wallet invite link to an email address.

carrier_tours_create.description: user can create a new tour

carrier_delivery_notes_share_rights.description: Shares the rights of delivery notes to another carrier site

delivery_notes_create.description: user can add new pdf file to a delivery note bundle

delivery_notes_read.description: user can read pdf file from a delivery note bundle

delivery_notes_update.description: user can update the metadata from a delivery note

delivery_notes_add_to_bundle.description: User can add existing delivery notes to an existing delivery note bundle.

delivery_notes_in_bundles_delete.description: user can delete delivery notes (pdf) in bundles

consignor_delivery_notes_complete_pdf_re.description: User can read a compelte pdf from a delivery note.

carrier_delivery_notes_complete_pdf_read.description: User can read a compelte pdf from a delivery note.

consignee_delivery_notes_complete_pdf_re.description: User can read a compelte pdf from a delivery note.

carrier_delivery_note_keys_lookup.description: User can lookup as a carrier organization site delivery note keys by consignor gln, deliveryNote number and optional deliveryNote orderNumber

consignee_checkins_read.description: User can get a checkin document.

consignee_checkin_driver_details_update.description: User can set driver information of checkins

consignee_delivery_notes_lookup_with_tok.description: User can get a list of checkinable delivery notes by wallet token

consignee_pallet_tickets_create.description: This permission is needed to create a pallet ticket

consignee_pallet_tickets_read.description: This permission is needed to read a pallet ticket

consignee_pallet_tickets_delete.description: This permission is needed to delete a pallet ticket

signature_pads_create.description: create a new signature pad for checkout or checkin

signature_pads_read.description: read data from a signature pad

allow_bundle_creation_with_loose_supply_.description: Allows the creation of bundles with loose supply chains.

Token64LengthType.description: Token with length 64. Used in different requests.

ApiKeyAuth.name: dlssessionid
ApiKeyAuth.description: API-keys and session ids are used as synonyms. The only difference is that an API-key is not able to log himself out. Otherwise it would be destroyed.
